metadata.title: CVE-2022-1649 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Null pointer dereference in libr/bin/format/mach0/mach0.c inradareorg/radare2 in GitHub repository radareorg/radare2 prior to 5.7.0. Itis likely to be exploitable. For more general description of heap bufferoverflow, see [CWE](https://cwe.mitre.org/data/definitions/476.html).

criterions.comment: radare2 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
